title: N28's for sale: Clarkson, Glasscock, Bennett

posts.post_title: N28's for sale: Clarkson, Glasscock, Bennett
posts.post_content:
Shipped, check or money order.

Due to file-size, just posting Glasscock and Clarkson images, but if you have serious interest in Bennett, I'll email to you.

Kelly - PSA1 **SOLD**
Clarkson -PSA 2 $440
Glasscock -PSA 2.5 $310
Bennett -PSA 2.5 $310

[IMG]http://i.ebayimg.com/t/1887-N28-Allen-Ginter-John-CLARKSON-PSA-2-Good-Vintage-Tobacco-Baseball-Card-/00/s/MTM2MVgxNjAw/$(KGrHqNHJBME9rg,IU3HBPgQMrFBMw~~60_57.JPG[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.ebayimg.com/t/1887-N28-Allen-Ginter-GLASSCOCK-PSA-2-5-Good-Vintage-Tobacco-Baseball-Card-/00/s/MTM0MlgxNjAw/$(KGrHqNHJEQE88dEzBgpBPgQG1on8g~~60_57.JPG[/IMG]

Kelly is sold.

Also, the Anson I've mentioned to a few of you is also sold.  It's on a payment plan, so if that falls through, I'll re-post it here.  Thanks.

[quote name="Runscott" post=983619]Kelly is sold.[/QUOTE]

The King is gone but he's not forgotten.

I had the Clarkson mis-priced, but no one attempted to buy it, so no damage.


Clarkson, Bennett and Glasscock still available.
